infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to enable you to send photos in chat conversations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to enable you to send images in chat conversations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to save images from chat conversations.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record voice messages in chat conversations.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
